CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pick one or more actions that the contact intends to complete.
CustomField.label: Initial Intention to Act

value.fullName: Use the information I received to make decisions
value.label: Use the information I received to make decisions

value.fullName: Use the information I received to talk to my doctor
value.label: Use the information I received to talk to my doctor

value.fullName: Share this information with family and/or friends
value.label: Share this information with family and/or friends

value.fullName: Gather appropriate medical records / information in order to understand diagnosis a little better or answer certain questions
value.label: Gather appropriate medical records / information in order to understand diagnosis a little better or answer certain questions

value.fullName: Call the helpline back at a later time
value.label: Call the helpline back at a later time
